author: Special Correspondent
text:
As many as 113 police personnel have been promoted and the Inspector General of Police passed an order in this regard on Monday.

As per the order, Sub-Inspectors (SI) of police were promoted to the rank of Inspectors of police.

K. Lenin Bharathi, T. Nagarajan, A. Lakshmanan, S. Balamurugan, K.V. Muthusamy, K. Shanmugam, S. Karthikeyan were the SIs who were promoted as Inspectors.

Santhappan, Head Constable, Band Unit, has been promoted as Sub-Inspector of police.

Further, three police constables were promoted as Special Grade Head Constables (SGHC) , 53 head constables were promoted as Special Grade ASIs and 57 ASIs were promoted as Selection Grade Sub-Inspectors of police.
title: Promotions announced for police personnel
